name: Bandit Life
description:
Bandit Life is a western topdown shooter winner of the 48 hours jam Game Dev Jam.

In Bandit Life you are a common lowlife that goes from town to town robbing people and getting more and more notorious.

As you rob more people, things get more dangerous, so you need to take the train and go to the next town! But the more the towns you visit, the more things will quickly escalate.

The towns are procedurally generated, so the game is different at each time you play.
